data.content: Renamed all Beads-prefixed workflow exports to backend-agnostic names (builtinProfileDescriptor, builtinWorkflowDescriptors, deriveProfileId, deriveWorkflowState, etc.) with deprecated aliases for backward compat. Updated 10 callers, backend-port.ts JSDoc, and buildPollPrompt error messages. 21 new tests. Descriptor labels now use Workflow prefix instead of Beads. All existing 822 tests pass. Commit: 88d1c71
